rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A modern living room with open layout and natural light through large windows.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Spacious dining area adjacent to the kitchen.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with integrated appliances and sufficient workspace.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony. Vastu principles ensure the bed is positioned diagonally opposite to the entrance for positive energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Well-lit bedroom with a spacious balcony and Vastu-compliant placement of the bed.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom designed for guest use with access to a balcony and ample natural light.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library space with bookshelves and comfortable seating. Designed as a quiet study area aligned with Vastu principles of knowledge flow.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom attached to master bedroom for convenience.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Additional bathroom adjacent to Bedroom 3 and library area.
